hours_text:
# Visit The Grace

The Grace Museum is a place for all ages to explore art, history, and creativity. Our 1909 building was originally the Hotel Grace, built to welcome travelers on the railroad. Since 1992, The Grace Museum has been a cornerstone to the revival of Abilene’s Downtown area as a welcoming center for the arts and community activity.

**We hope you will enjoy your visit to The Grace Museum and will return to visit us often**!

####  Museum Hours 

**Tuesday-Saturday** : 10am-5pm

**_FREE Thursday Nights: 5-8pm_**

Closed Sunday & Monday

[Click here for _Spark_ visiting hours](http://web.archive.org/web/20260101151754/https://thegracemuseum.org/exhibitions/spark/)

####  Holiday Closures 

**New Years:** CLOSED Jan 1

**Good Friday:** CLOSED Apr 18

**Independence Day:** CLOSED Jul 4

**Thanksgiving:** CLOSED Nov 26-28

**Christmas:** CLOSED Dec 24-26 & 31

[ ](http://web.archive.org/web/20260101151754/https://www.aam-us.org/)

####  Admission 

**$8** – Adults 18+

**$5** – Children ages 4-17, Seniors 65+, Students & Educators (with ID), Retired Military (with ID)

**FREE** – Children ages 0-3, Museum Members, Active Duty Military Families (with ID)

####  Location 

102 Cypress Street

Abilene, TX 79601

325-673-4587

[info@thegracemuseum.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20260101151754/mailto:info@thegracemuseum.org)

[ ](http://web.archive.org/web/20260101151754/https://www.arts.gov/initiatives/blue-star-museums)

admission_text:
# Grace Memberships

* * *

## All Grace Members Receive These Benefits:

  * **FREE ADMISSION** to The Grace Museum year-round
  * **Annual subscription** to the Museum’s magazine, _Artifacts_
  * **10% discount** in The Grace Gift Shop
  * **Discounts** on educational camps and classes
  * **Invitations** to opening receptions, gallery talks and museum programs
  * **FREE** members-only events

#### Benefits for each individual membership level can be viewed in detail below.

####  DUAL: $45 

All Member Benefits +

• Admission for two adults

####  FAMILY: $65 

All Member Benefits +

  * Admission for two adults and all children in your household

####  SUPPORTER: $100 

All Member Benefits +

  * Admission for two adults and all children in your household

  * Reciprocal admission to hundreds of museums across North America

####  ADVOCATE: $300 

All Member Benefits +

  * Admission for two adults and all children in your household

  * Reciprocal admission to hundreds of museums across North America

  * 10% discount on one rental for your special event

####  SUSTAINER: $600 

All Member Benefits +

  * Admission for four adults and all children in your household

  * Reciprocal admission to hundreds of museums across North America

  * 20% discount on one rental for your special event

####  BENEFACTOR: $1,200 

All Member Benefits +

  * Admission for four adults and all children in your household

  * Reciprocal admission to hundreds of museums across North America...

[Now On View](http://web.archive.org/web/20260105230117/https://thegracemuseum.org/exhibitions/cindi-holt-2025/)

[Now On View](http://web.archive.org/web/20260105230117/https://thegracemuseum.org/exhibitions/focus-on-photography-selections-from-the-permanent-collection/)

[Now On View](http://web.archive.org/web/20260105230117/https://thegracemuseum.org/exhibitions/full-steam-ahead/)

  * ## Early Downtown Abilene: 1880s-1910s

[Now On View](http://web.archive.org/web/20260105230117/https://thegracemuseum.org/exhibitions/early-downtown-abilene/)

  * ### STEAM & Go!

Jan 2 | Stop by The Grace for a “cool” activity 2-4pm in the Create Lab where you’ll explore the science behind polymers and make your own artificial snow! Fun for any age – FREE with museum admission. 

[Learn More __](http://web.archive.org/web/20260105230117/https://thegracemuseum.org/event/steam-go-1-2-26/ "Learn More")
